title: Victoria Beckham dons bright outfit for New York City outing
text:
She's her own best advert for her eponymous fashion label.

And Victoria Beckham was rocking an autumnal look from her collection when she stepped out in style in New York City on Tuesday morning, embracing the colour-blocking trend.

The designer, 45, sported a purple wool knit teamed with a contrasting bright red skirt, power dressing ahead of an appearance on the Today show.

Block it like Beckham: Victoria Beckham was rocking an autumnal look from her collection when she stepped out in style in New York City on Tuesday morning, embracing the colour-blocking trend

Victoria added a preppy twist to the look with a smart shirt featuring coordinating scarlet stitching.

The Spice Girls singer completed her attire with a pair of peep toe boots in the exact same shade as her skirt.

The star tied her hair back in a ponytail and added a pair of her obligatory oversized sunglasses.

Bright: The designer, 45, sported a purple wool knit teamed with a contrasting bright red skirt, power dressing ahead of an appearance on the Today show

The outing came after Victoria revealed the boozy secret to her healthy lifestyle during a playful appearance on This Morning.

The Spice Girl discussed her penchant for tequila and red wine alongside a balanced lifestyle on the show, saying: 'I try to be really really healthy, I expect a lot of myself and my body.

'I have four kids and work a lot, I try to be healthy, fresh fish, fresh vegetables, fruit and I drink a lot of water.

Fancy footwear: The Spice Girls singer completed her attire with a pair of peep toe boots in the exact same shade as her skirt

'I am not saying I’m not fun, I am known to drink a few tequilas and a few red wines, it’s that balance. Working out, but having fun is also super important.'

Discussing her tips for good skin, the star added: 'Definitely take make-up off every night before bed, use a really good moisturiser that works for your skin type and stay hydrated!

'I haven’t always had good skin, I pay a lot of attention to my skin, not just on my skin, eating healthy as well and drinking water… basic things that make a difference!

'Using a good moisturiser, making sure my skin is hydrated and changing it up as well, I think is important.
